scripts.check: lamdera check && elm-test-rs --compiler $(which lamdera) && npx elm-review --fix-all
scripts.deploy: elm-test-rs --compiler $(which lamdera) && npx elm-review && lamdera deploy
scripts.end-to-end-tests: lamdera make end-to-end-tests/EndToEndTestsRunner.elm --output end-to-end-tests/EndToEndTestsRunnerElm.js && cd end-to-end-tests && node EndToEndTestsRunner.js
